alert.note: Alert for Berks; Lehigh; Northampton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 04 at 3:10AM EST until February 04 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Morris and Warren. In Pennsylvania, Northampton, Lehigh and Berks. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 5 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Be prepared for slippery conditions on area roads, especially bridges and overpasses, and walkways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to areas of freezing rain by later this morning before possibly ending as some sleet or light snow. Temperatures will rapidly drop to freezing and then below freezing later this morning and through the afternoon. Any wet untreated surfaces can quickly become icy.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
